text:
Works fine on 1.6 for me.

```julia> Model(optimizer_with_attributes(ECOS.Optimizer,
                 "feastol" => 1e-6,
                 "reltol" => 1e-6,
                 "abstol" => 1e-6,
                 "maxit" => 100,
                 "verbose" => 0,
              ))
A JuMP Model
Feasibility problem with:
Variables: 0
Model mode: AUTOMATIC
CachingOptimizer state: EMPTY_OPTIMIZER
Solver name: ECOS

julia> versioninfo()
Julia Version 1.6.0-rc1```
